value:
$WmMPID_比翼ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_FF_Pair,Face|Are you sure you're feeling well, Eir?
You still look awfully pale to me.$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|I'm fine, Ymir, really...$k$p$WmMPID_水着フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Swim23,Face|Ah, I feel much better after that little
break. I think I've got some beach
energy in me yet!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ドニ,ch04_04_Denis_M_Swim23,Face|Now, where should I go about settin'
up the net next?$k$p$WmMPID_水着サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_Swim23,Face|Are you interfering with my plans on
purpose? I'll curse you...$k$p$WmMPID_水着アイビー,ch19_17_Ivy_F_Swim23,Face|Do you two mind? You're blocking
my view of the Divine Dragon. This is
spiritual for me, I'll have you know.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_44_Ymir_FF_Pair,Face|...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|I can see that you're not well, Eir.
Did something happen?$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Ymir...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|All right, all right. You don't want to
talk about it. I won't force you.$k$pI'm sorry. I don't mean to nag you
so much. I'm sure it's gotten on your
nerves by now.$k$pYou're probably craving some time
to yourself. Let me get out of your
way—I'll be just over there.$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|No! Please don't go!$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Eir?$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Forgive me. I wanted to tell you what
was bothering me, but it's difficult
to put into words...$k$pWhen we sat in the shade earlier...
I saw Hel. I don't know if she was
an illusion, or...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|You saw Hel?! But I didn't sense
anything amiss... Perhaps it was
only in your mind?$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Likely, yes. But the sight of her is not
what bothered me. When I saw her...
I instinctively called her "Mother."$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Ah...$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|After all that's happened... Even
knowing it's only thanks to you and
my true mother that I'm alive...$k$pSomehow, when I see Hel, I still...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|That's not your fault. In fact, it's
completely understandable.$k$pYou were with Hel for so long—much
longer than you've been with any
of the rest of us.$k$pIs this truly what's been bothering
you all day?$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Of course it is. We have this rare
opportunity to relax, and here I am
dredging up the past... I'm sorry.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Eir, listen to me. You have absolutely
nothing to apologize for.$k$pOn the contrary, I'm happy because
you were open and honest with me
about your feelings.$k$pThe way you clung to me and told me
not to go—just like when you were
young. Butterflies in my stomach!$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Ymir, I'm being serious...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Hee hee. Me too! It's important to
ask for help when you need it.
I'm proud of you.$k$pI hope you'll keep on reaching out
whenever you need a little support.$k$pNot just to me, but to the summoner
and everyone else as well.$k$pAnd I don't mean just in emergencies
or when you have a problem! I mean
when you're sad or hurting too, OK?$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|All right...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Thank you. I think it will do you a lot
of good to share things like that
with people.$k$pSoon enough your doubts will be
nothing more than a memory.$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|With you and all our friends to
support me, I think you might
be right.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|See? You're doing great!$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Yes... It's all clear to me now...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Hm? What is it?$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Nothing important. Shall we go for
another dip in the water?$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Ooo, yes! Race you!$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|It wasn't Hel...it was my own mind.
A manifestation of my insecurity,
telling me to beware...$k$pWarning me that I should not enjoy
the happiness of this beach, or Ymir's
company...for fear of losing it.$k$pBut I've come to understand that,
if I don't face that fear, I'll never
be happy in the first place.$k$pThanks to Ymir, and all my friends,
I finally have the strength to do that.$k$pThank you, everyone. This is a trip
I will never forget...$k$p$Sbs150|
